Title: Carry Abaddon, with a twist of Healer.

ItemTooltips.courier: Only if there isnt any support to get it.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Good for the extra damage and speed if someone is running away. One boost and hit, and your passive does for the rest of the hunting.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: This is necessary for an easier living since the shield  Vlads will make you heal up easy.
ItemTooltips.heart: Extra damage, health AND regen. Once you get this, you can easily heal allies when they need for a great amount, since you easily recover the HP while out of combat. Given that you have enough mana of course.
ItemTooltips.basher: Not really necessary since you have a lot of move speed and enemy slow. But helps against tough heroes like Naix and Huskar.
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: Attack speed, damage, maim chance. Aah, S&Y.
